ygData.subject: Neo Beast Wars
ygData.msgSnippet: Gangon and Lightmare lay on the hill, fading away. Plintissa and Dracona walk past the hill. Plintissa and Dracona look at what was left of Lightmare and

Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

Gangon and Lightmare lay on the hill, fading away. Plintissa and Dracona wa=
lk past the hill. Plintissa and Dracona look at what was left of Lightmare =
and Gangon. Artist pulled out his blaster and aimed it at Lightmare and Gan=
gon.

"Wait! Let's not be so hasty! Bring them on back to the base, they ma=
y be of some use." Dracona said. Gangon and Lightmare awake in the Poeple's=
 Base, they seem to be all fixed up. Gangon tries to move and screams from =
the massive pain in his chest. Lightmare is laying in the bed next to his.
=

"Wha? Who would save us?" Gangon asked. Lightmare shook her head. Dracona =
showed up. Artist and Plintissa walked in the room. Artist's eyes go huge a=
nd he grabs Lightmare by the throat! Plintissa pushes Artist away.

"You ki=
lled Suukie!!!" Artist screams at the top of his lungs. Lihtmare was filled=
 with fear, he knew about her assisted murder. Artist grabbed his head and =
screamed, the same words repeating over and over again in his head.

"Suuki=
e does not exist! Suukie does not exist! Suukie does not exist! Suukie does=
 not exist! Suukie does not exist!" The voice said, it was Suukie's voice. =
Artist screamed and aimed his rifle at his head. The rifle was shot out of =
his hand just before he pulled the trigger. Plintissa was holding the blast=
er that fired the shot. Plintissa looked into Artist's eyes, a kind look. A=
rtist stared at her, a cold and evil stare, a stare done once by Suukie. Ar=
tist cried angrily. Plintissa looked sadly into his eyes. Artist suddenly p=
ushed Plintissa over.

"Stop staring at me!" Artist screamed. Dracona helpe=
d Plintissa up.

"Why did you bother to save me? I have no life any more!" =
Gangon said.

"Don't talk like that, I'm sorry about your girlfriend, but I=
 feel you can find somebody else that loves you." Dracona said.

"Can't you=
 see my pain? Can't you see that I have no more reason to live? I am lonely=
! I am depressed! I have no friends! I have no team! I have no family! I ha=
ve no life! Kill me! Kill me now!" Gangon said. Gangon cried, but every tea=
r and word hurt.

"Please excuse me." Dracona said. Dracona and Plintissa w=
alk into the next room. Artist looked at Lightmare, a look of evil in his e=
yes.

"Plintissa, don't say anything about this, but Gangon's damage is muc=
h more severe than Lightmare's damage." Dracona said.

"Yes, and?" Plintiss=
a asked.

"Gangon is never going to be able to move again, he's destroyed."=
 Dracona said. Plintissa sighed.

"And Lightmare?" Plintissa asked.

"She h=
appened to be able to activate her force field before her massacre, she'll =
heal before long, but Gangon's spinal cord was wrecked." Dracona said.

Pli=
ntissa sighed.

"We'll have to break the news eventually. Maybe he can ride=
 in a wheel chair?" Plintissa asked.

"He'll never be able to get out of th=
at bed again." Dracona said sadly. Plintissa was silent.

"And Lightmare ha=
s lost control of her left arm." Dracona added. Plintissa sighed again. She=
 hated to break news, but Dracona, she knew would break the news in a not s=
o soft way, and Plintissa knew that she had to do it. Plintissa walked back=
 into the room. Gangon was laying there, looking depressed. Lightmare was t=
rying to work her arm, but to no avail.

"Hey, what's wrong with my arm?" L=
ightmare asked. Plintissa groaned. Artist looked at her, this was the bot w=
ho had killed somebody, but he had no idea who she killed, and he was getti=
ng really angry at his memory. Plintissa walked forward to break the bad ne=
ws to them...
